metadataAttributes.Title: Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Applications for Executives
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: In this course, you will explore the challenges of diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) for business and corporate leaders. You will consider questions like: How does maximizing an organization’s diversity benefit stakeholders? How can we improve employee performance? What can we do to advance institutional progress?
metadataAttributes.Skills: Business Psychology,Organization Development,Business Strategy,Leadership And Management,Leadership Development,
